title.text: Front-End Web Developer and Software Systems Engineering Student

about.subtitle: About Me
about.text1: By the end of 2019 I decided to learn programming with Python on my own while I was still in HighSchool and I realized that I wanted to continue learning. So in 2020 I graduated and decided to study Software Systems Engineering.
about.text2: In mid-2021 I started to get interested in web development and I started learning HTML and CSS on my own and finally learning tools like React and Tailwind. Currently I continue to learn more about web development while I continue my university career.
about.text3: I am self-taught, passionate about technology. Always ready to take on new challenges

proyectos.subtitle: My Projects
proyectos.p1-text: Relaxing Sounds Generator made with React
proyectos.p2-text: Sneakers Store Model. Made with Tailwind CSS and React
proyectos.p3-text: Connect Four game made with Javascript
proyectos.p4-text: Simple Authenticator. Made using libraries like Axios, React Forms, and an API for the user backend
proyectos.p5-text: Clone of the Wordle game made using React
